/ Demo scene to display all the capabilities of raytra.

/ options - [max_trace_depth] [samples] [shadow_samples] [glossy_samples]
o 3 9 128 64
/o 3 1 1 1

/ 1st sphere
s 0. 5 -40.57 5.
m 0.0 0.855 0.1 0.3 0.3 0.3 100. 0.7 0.7 0.7
g .45

/ 2nd sphere
s 30. 7.5 -62.57 7.5.
m 0.855 0.427 0.1 0.3 0.3 0.3 200 0.7 0.7 0.7
g .45

/ 3rd sphere
s 50. 10 -40.57 10.
m 0.855 0.0 0.1 0.2 0.2 0.2 100. 0.8 0.8 0.8
g .45

/ 4th sphere
s -15 2.5 -60.57 2.5
m 0.1 0.0 0.855 0.2 0.2 0.2 100. 0.0 0.0 0.0
/g .45

/ 5th sphere (refraction)
s 30 15 -15.57 15
m 0.0 0.0 0.0 0.2 0.2 0.2 100. 0.8 0.8 0.8
r 2.0 0.15 0.15 0.15

/ 6th sphere
/s -20 8 -15.57 8
/m 0.6 0.0 0.7 0.8 0.0 0.3 100. 0.7 0.7 0.7
/g .45

/ point light
/l p -20 45 -20.57 1.0 1.0 1.0

/ Area light
/l r -10 0 0 0 0 10 -20. 45. -30.57 1.0 1.0 1.0
/l r -20 0 0 0 0 10 -20. 45. -30.57 1.0 1.0 1.0
l r -13 5 0 0 0 10 -20. 45. -30.57 1.0 1.0 1.0

/ camera: pointing towards -Z, 35mmx25mm "film", 25mm focal length
/ making 500x234 pixels
c -100.2 40.0 -35.6 80.0 -20 -3.0 50.0 35.0 25.0 500 324
